page.title: 14HOUSING IN TYSOE
page.content: There are 351 residential buildings in the area under review, of which 27 belong to 3 local landowners and are either rented out or occupied by present or retired staff. There are 104 properties belonging to Stratford on Avon District Council, and 1 owned by a charitable trust; the majority are owner occupied. Building materials used are Hornton stone and brick, in almost equal proportions, with no more than 4% reconstituted stone. In the Structure Plan for Warwickshire, Tysoe is not scheduled for further residential development except in exceptional circumstances to meet local needs, e.g. the conversion of a listed barn or housing for agricultural workers or the clergy.
